name: creamily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is like cream, or containing cream: Beat the yolks into the marmalade until they are creamily mixed. Whisk as you pour in the liquid, until you have a creamily thick and smooth batter.
More examplesFewer examplesFor lunch, we ate a crusty seeded loaf and a nice chunk of creamily mature English cheddar.The ice cream was creamily fruity and delicious.The chocolates ooze creamily when you bite into them.My baked egg custard cake was creamily magnificent.
